channel.title: Cant get server to run
channel.description: whenever i try to run my server it says this Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: PlayerHandler at server.main(server.java:26) Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: misc at server.run(server.java:126) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . . what do i do

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Right click your “runserver.bat” and replace everything that is there with this:

@echo off title [yourservernamehere] java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Cant get server to run
item.dc:creator: @dutch_fury dutch fury
item.description:
@dutch_fury wrote:

whenever i try to run my server it says this Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: PlayerHandler
at server.main(server.java:26)
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: misc
at server.run(server.java:126)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .
what do i do
